content.description:
POPULATION PYRAMID

The population pyramid shown represents a local area that has been affected by human migration.
content.question:
A. Explain why the population shown in the pyramid might have this particular sex ratio.

B. Describe a cultural push factor that would motivate a male migrant from a rural area to move to an urban area in a very distant location.

C. Explain the probable long-term population growth pattern expected in the location shown in the population pyramid.

D. Explain the degree to which the demographic pattern shown in the pyramid may result in changes to the local cultural landscape.

frqParts.text:

D. Explain the degree to which the demographic pattern shown in the pyramid may result in changes to the local cultural landscape.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
